titles.title: A resolution authorizing use of the Hart Building atrium for a concert by the Congressional Chorus.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/29/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the use of the atrium of the Senate Hart Office Building, on one day during the spring and one day during the winter of each session of the 103d Congress, for a concert of American music by the Congressional Chorus.
